thread.section_title: Marbles: the Brain Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Marbles: the Brain Store | www.marblesthebrainstore.com
thread.title: Stephanie Terrell
thread.title_full: Marbles: the Brain Store reviewed by Stephanie Terrell

author: Stephanie Terrell
title: Stephanie Terrell
text: Visited the store at Myrtle Beach in December of last year. There was so much fun stuff, puzzles, etc. Like a toy store for all ages. Was with my two twenty-something daughters and they both found items they wanted. Prices are reasonable as well.
